data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Bingöl, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bingöl, Turkey
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Please, teach the 100 believers in Bingöl, Turkey how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.section_summary: On average, 46 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Bingöl, Turkey.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Bingöl, Turkey who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Bingöl.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Gajal, Gadzhal people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Gajal, Gadzhal people know you.
Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Bingöl, Turkey a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Bingöl, Turkey find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.section_summary:
the state of Bingöl, Turkey has a population of 265,500.

We estimate Bingöl has 100 people who might know Jesus, 1,486 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 263,914 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2,654 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the state of Bingöl against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.
